entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Niagara Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:55 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Catharines / Niagara District Airport 08:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 74 %
Dewpoint: -2.5°C
Wind: SW 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this morning. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Rainfall amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 80 late in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
